ADDENDUM 
 
Subject : 
Enforcement action in case of deficiency in aviation security. 
Reference :  
AVSEC Order No. 04/2005 dated 08-2-2005. 
 
 
In continuation to AVSEC order no. 04/2005 dated 08/2/2005, the following 
contents may be inserted as para no. 2 in the above mentioned AVSEC Order:- 
 
“  2. 
During the course of survey/audit/inspection/tests (dummy check), if any 
person performing security functions is found deficient in performance of duties, other 
than screeners, the Inspecting Officer of BCAS shall give a notice in writing (as per 
Annexure-II) to the security in-charge of the entity concerned to remove such person 
from security duties with immediate effect till he /she is recertified by BCAS or 
undergoes refresher training, as is applicable. It shall be the responsibility of entity 
concerned to withdraw such person from security duties immediately and to make 
necessary alternate arrangements to ensure continuity of aviation security operations. The 
same action shall also be taken by the concerned entity during their internal quality 
control checks under intimation to BCAS.” 
 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Encl: As above.  
 
(R. N. Dhoke, IPS) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
